role.argrole: thing arg0 sees a lot of

example.parse: (IP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 面对) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (NN 资讯) (NN 时代)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 竞争))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 看多) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (NN 产业) (NN 起伏)))) (PU 、) (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-SBJ (NN 韧性) (CC 和) (NN 弹性)) (VP (VA 十足)))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 叶进泰))) (VP (ADVP (AD 毫不)) (VP (VV 退缩))))
